name: old piano
description: It's an old wooden piano with the front taken off so that the hammers can be seen as the keys are played.
interaction descriptions: You pluck a few notes on the dusty keys. The thing seems like it hasn't been tuned in years.

name: entrance sign
description: The sign is made of old, broken wood, with paint that has long ago faded from the sun. The thick, blocky letters read: "Welcome to Tull."
